sentences.en: Police swooped on the home after a two-week surveillance operation.
sentences.cn: 警方经过两周的监视行动后突击搜查了该住宅。

sentences.en: The prize for the winner of the competition is a two-week holiday in Paris.
sentences.cn: 比赛获胜者的奖品是在巴黎度过两周的假期。

sentences.en: We're offering an all-inclusive two-week trip to Mexico for only 300 dollars.
sentences.cn: 我们提供在墨西哥的两周游，只要300美元，一切费用都包括在内。
